testcase.name: Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters valid credentials And the user clicks the login button Then the user should be redirected to the dashboard

testcase.name: Scenario: Failed login with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters an invalid password And the user clicks the login button Then an error message should be displayed

testcase.name: Scenario: Login with locked account
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters credentials for a locked account And the user clicks the login button Then the account locked message should be displayed
